description: RPM build failed due to missing directory: /usr/lib/python3/site-packages/Thingy-0.10.0.dist-info. The required distribution metadata files were not generated or installed correctly during packaging.
CMake configuration error: Policy CMP0042 set to OLD is no longer supported. The CMake version requires updated policy settings in CMakeLists.txt.
CMake error: Compatibility with CMake < 3.5 removed. Update cmake_minimum_required in CMakeLists.txt to a supported version.
CMake error: cmake_minimum_required specifies an outdated CMake version. Update to a minimum supported version using modern syntax.
CMake error: Policy CMP0020 set to OLD is unsupported. Update CMakeLists.txt to use NEW behavior for automatic linking of Qt libraries.
Compilation failed due to missing lapack.h header. Ensure LAPACK development packages are installed to resolve dependency.
CMake error: Policy CMP0043 set to OLD is no longer supported. Update CMakeLists.txt to use NEW behavior for library output directories.
Build dependency error: rpm-macros-qt4 package not found. Install required Qt4 macros or update build dependencies.
CMake error: Policy CMP0043 set to OLD is unsupported. Update CMakeLists.txt to use NEW behavior for library output directory handling.
